name: Just Another Team's MnK rolls - Season 8
description: Just Another Team's recommendations for Season 8. Recommended for Mouse and Keyboard.

data.description: Rapid Hit is an S tier perk and ramps up the stability and recoil of the weapon - one burst and you could have several stacks of the perk primed and ready.
Rapid Hit is an S tier perk and ramps up the stability and recoil of the weapon - one burst and you could have several stacks of the perk primed and ready.

Arrowhead Brake takes recoil direction to 100.
Arrowhead Brake takes recoil direction to 100.

The final column does not have any perks worth searching for in PvE, so Swash has been included for it’s potential to give the first few shots some better damage. But it’s not worth killing a roll just because it doesn’t have Swash.
Curated.
Fluted + Counterbalance Mod makes recoil direction 100.
Fluted + Counterbalance Mod makes recoil direction 100. Swash is included for the bodyshot potential of x5 swash, best paired with a melee build.

This gun can get some really nice rolls, but the most important part is Kill Clip, allowing it to two tap after the damage nerf, depending on how the gun feels for you, the split minor stat boost barrels and steady rounds can help to make up for the terrible base stats.

This gun can get some really nice rolls, but the most important part is Kill Clip, allowing it to two tap after the damage nerf, depending on how the gun feels for you, the split minor stat boost barrels and steady rounds can help to make up for the terrible base stats.
One of two current available snipers that can roll Firmly Planted + Opening Shot - they stack for max accuracy bonuses.
One of two current available snipers that can roll Firmly Planted + Opening Shot - they stack for max accuracy bonuses.
One of two current available snipers that can roll Firmly Planted + Opening Shot - they stack for max accuracy bonuses.
For PvP either Summoner or Gnawing Hunger is preferred.

Under Pressure is essentially a better version of Heating Up which doesn’t need a kill. However you do need to choose between the two best in slot perks for fusions, Under Pressure and Firmly Planted.

Under Pressure is essentially a better version of Heating Up which doesn’t need a kill. However you do need to choose between the two best in slot perks for fusions, Under Pressure and Firmly Planted.

While Subsistence does work against MKC and KC, this weapon is really lacking for good perks, and generally you use enough bullets against slightly tougher red bars that you don’t get all your ammo back, allowing you to proc the reload based perks.

Some excellent PvE rolls on the best MG archetype with a rare elemental type (only Arc 450 MG).

PvP: It’s a sword, it doesn’t matter.

In PvE, Seraph Carbine does everything this auto does and it makes cells.
In PvP, Werewolf has some incredible accuracy perks.
